title: Biden, on inaugural Asia visit, says would be willing to use force to defend Taiwan
content:
1. Biden, on inaugural Asia visit, says would be willing to use force to defend Taiwan  Reuters
  2. US military will defend Taiwan 'if it comes to that,' Biden says  Fox News
  3. Biden says US willing to respond 'militarily' in event of Chinese attack on Taiwan  CNN
  4. Biden: willing to use force to defend Taiwan  Reuters
  5. Biden says U.S. willing to use force to defend Taiwan — prompting backlash from China  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
